artist: Artist: Worcester Porcelain Works (a.k.a. Royal Worcester Porcelain Company)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Sumner T. McKnight
medium: Porcelain with underglaze blue and enamel decoration
text: During the 18th century, English ceramic factories imitated Chinese ceramics in an effort to compete with the lucrative porcelain market.  This teapot, inspired by a Chinese model, is decorated with Chinese-style court ladies.
title: Teapot
